content.name: Pair Programming
content.description: Relay but in coding!Do you think you can handle the questions thrown at you? A duo challenge to put your minds to a test.
rules: One member in a team will code for a given time and switches with another team member.
First problem statement should be solved by a participant on their own.
For second problem, both members of the team can work together for a certain time (applicable for top 3 teams that finish the first problem).
Winners will be selected according to their finishing time.
